title: Introducing: walkingshoe
body:
Really love this songwriting from Chicago’s walkingshoe – sits somewhere between the slightly twee twang of Neutral Milk Hotel and the raw, heart-on-sleeve honesty of Nick Drake.

Having previously featured on / produced for a whole host of other artists, his past couple of tracks show a little more direction and ambition of his own. Check out the intimate _Paper Moon_ and the more jovial, _Can’t Sleep_ below.

Having previously featured on / produced for a whole host of other artists, his past couple of tracks show a little more direction and ambition of his own. \[…\]
